00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00031  *
00032  * lustre/ofd/ofd_fmd.c
00033  *
00034  * This file provides functions to handle Filter Modification Data (FMD).
00035  * The FMD is responsible for file attributes to be applied in
00036  * Transaction ID (XID) order, so older requests can't re-write newer
00037  * attributes.
00038  *
00039  * FMD is organized as per-client list and identified by FID of object. Each
00040  * FMD stores FID of object and the highest received XID of modification
00041  * request for this object.
00042  *
00043  * FMD can expire if there are no updates for a long time to keep the list
00044  * reasonably small.
00045  *
00046  * Author: Andreas Dilger <andreas.dilger@intel.com>
00047  */
00048 
00049 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_FILTER
00050 
00051 #include "ofd_internal.h"
00052 
00053 static struct kmem_cache *ll_fmd_cachep;
00054 
00063 static inline void ofd_fmd_put_nolock(struct obd_export *exp,
00064                                       struct ofd_mod_data *fmd)
00065 {
00066         struct filter_export_data *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00067 
00068         assert_spin_locked(&fed->fed_lock);
00069         if (--fmd->fmd_refcount == 0) {
00070                 /* XXX when we have persistent reservations and the handle
00071                  * is stored herein we need to drop it here. */
00072                 fed->fed_mod_count--;
00073                 list_del(&fmd->fmd_list);
00074                 OBD_SLAB_FREE(fmd, ll_fmd_cachep, sizeof(*fmd));
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00084 void ofd_fmd_put(struct obd_export *exp, struct ofd_mod_data *fmd)
00085 {
00086         struct filter_export_data *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00087 
00088         if (fmd == NULL)
00089                 return;
00090 
00091         spin_lock(&fed->fed_lock);
00092         ofd_fmd_put_nolock(exp, fmd); /* caller reference */
00093         spin_unlock(&fed->fed_lock);
00094 }
00095 
00111 static void ofd_fmd_expire_nolock(struct obd_export *exp,
00112                                   struct ofd_mod_data *keep)
00113 {
00114         struct filter_export_data       *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00115         struct ofd_device               *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
00116         struct ofd_mod_data             *fmd, *tmp;
00117 
00118         cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current();
00119 
00120         list_for_each_entry_safe(fmd, tmp, &fed->fed_mod_list, fmd_list) {
00121                 if (fmd == keep)
00122                         break;
00123 
00124                 if (cfs_time_before(now, fmd->fmd_expire) &&
00125                     fed->fed_mod_count < ofd->ofd_fmd_max_num)
00126                         break;
00127 
00128                 list_del_init(&fmd->fmd_list);
00129                 ofd_fmd_put_nolock(exp, fmd); /* list reference */
00130         }
00131 }
00132 
00140 void ofd_fmd_expire(struct obd_export *exp)
00141 {
00142         struct filter_export_data *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00143 
00144         spin_lock(&fed->fed_lock);
00145         ofd_fmd_expire_nolock(exp, NULL);
00146         spin_unlock(&fed->fed_lock);
00147 }
00148 
00162 static struct ofd_mod_data *ofd_fmd_find_nolock(struct obd_export *exp,
00163                                                 const struct lu_fid *fid)
00164 {
00165         struct filter_export_data       *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00166         struct ofd_mod_data             *found = NULL, *fmd;
00167         struct ofd_device               *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
00168 
00169         cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current();
00170 
00171         assert_spin_locked(&fed->fed_lock);
00172 
00173         list_for_each_entry_reverse(fmd, &fed->fed_mod_list, fmd_list) {
00174                 if (lu_fid_eq(&fmd->fmd_fid, fid)) {
00175                         found = fmd;
00176                         list_del(&fmd->fmd_list);
00177                         list_add_tail(&fmd->fmd_list, &fed->fed_mod_list);
00178                         fmd->fmd_expire = cfs_time_add(now, ofd->ofd_fmd_max_age);
00179                         break;
00180                 }
00181         }
00182 
00183         ofd_fmd_expire_nolock(exp, found);
00184 
00185         return found;
00186 }
00187 
00199 struct ofd_mod_data *ofd_fmd_find(struct obd_export *exp,
00200                                   const struct lu_fid *fid)
00201 {
00202         struct filter_export_data       *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00203         struct ofd_mod_data             *fmd;
00204 
00205         spin_lock(&fed->fed_lock);
00206         fmd = ofd_fmd_find_nolock(exp, fid);
00207         if (fmd)
00208                 fmd->fmd_refcount++;    /* caller reference */
00209         spin_unlock(&fed->fed_lock);
00210 
00211         return fmd;
00212 }
00213 
00228 struct ofd_mod_data *ofd_fmd_get(struct obd_export *exp, const struct lu_fid *fid)
00229 {
00230         struct filter_export_data       *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00231         struct ofd_device               *ofd = ofd_exp(exp);
00232         struct ofd_mod_data             *found = NULL, *fmd_new = NULL;
00233 
00234         cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current();
00235 
00236         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR(fmd_new, ll_fmd_cachep);
00237 
00238         spin_lock(&fed->fed_lock);
00239         found = ofd_fmd_find_nolock(exp, fid);
00240         if (fmd_new) {
00241                 if (found == NULL) {
00242                         list_add_tail(&fmd_new->fmd_list,
00243                                       &fed->fed_mod_list);
00244                         fmd_new->fmd_fid = *fid;
00245                         fmd_new->fmd_refcount++;   /* list reference */
00246                         found = fmd_new;
00247                         fed->fed_mod_count++;
00248                 } else {
00249                         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(fmd_new, ll_fmd_cachep);
00250                 }
00251         }
00252         if (found) {
00253                 found->fmd_refcount++; /* caller reference */
00254                 found->fmd_expire = cfs_time_add(now, ofd->ofd_fmd_max_age);
00255         }
00256 
00257         spin_unlock(&fed->fed_lock);
00258 
00259         return found;
00260 }
00261 
00262 #ifdef DO_FMD_DROP
00263 
00278 void ofd_fmd_drop(struct obd_export *exp, const struct lu_fid *fid)
00279 {
00280         struct filter_export_data       *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00281         struct ofd_mod_data             *found = NULL;
00282 
00283         spin_lock(&fed->fed_lock);
00284         found = ofd_fmd_find_nolock(exp, fid);
00285         if (found) {
00286                 list_del_init(&found->fmd_list);
00287                 ofd_fmd_put_nolock(exp, found);
00288         }
00289         spin_unlock(&fed->fed_lock);
00290 }
00291 #endif
00292 
00300 void ofd_fmd_cleanup(struct obd_export *exp)
00301 {
00302         struct filter_export_data       *fed = &exp->exp_filter_data;
00303         struct ofd_mod_data             *fmd = NULL, *tmp;
00304 
00305         spin_lock(&fed->fed_lock);
00306         list_for_each_entry_safe(fmd, tmp, &fed->fed_mod_list, fmd_list) {
00307                 list_del_init(&fmd->fmd_list);
00308                 if (fmd->fmd_refcount > 1) {
00309                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "fmd %p still referenced (refcount = %d)\n",
00310                                fmd, fmd->fmd_refcount);
00311                 }
00312                 ofd_fmd_put_nolock(exp, fmd);
00313         }
00314         spin_unlock(&fed->fed_lock);
00315 }
00316 
00323 int ofd_fmd_init(void)
00324 {
00325         ll_fmd_cachep = kmem_cache_create("ll_fmd_cache",
00326                                           sizeof(struct ofd_mod_data),
00327                                           0, 0, NULL);
00328         if (!ll_fmd_cachep)
00329                 return -ENOMEM;
00330         else
00331                 return 0;
00332 }
00333 
00340 void ofd_fmd_exit(void)
00341 {
00342         if (ll_fmd_cachep) {
00343                 kmem_cache_destroy(ll_fmd_cachep);
00344                 ll_fmd_cachep = NULL;
00345         }
00346 }
